document.full_text: british singer amy winehouse has ended her latest stint in rehab in london and will continue treatment as an outpatient, her spokeswoman said on thursday.
document.title: amy winehouse out of rehab and "raring to go"
lines_and_colors: british singer amy winehouse has ended her latest stint in rehab in london and will continue treatment as an outpatient, her spokeswoman said on thursday.
